plot: Aksim is a monkey that finds blending in with other monkeys tricky, until one day, the spirit of Chun Ja - a human girl - enters his mind and creates a divide which puts Aksim on a path of no return.
title: Aksim
plot_es: Aksim is a monkey that finds blending in with other monkeys tricky, until one day, the spirit of Chun Ja - a human girl - enters his mind and creates a divide which puts Aksim on a path of no return.
plot_en: Aksim is a monkey that finds blending in with other monkeys tricky, until one day, the spirit of Chun Ja - a human girl - enters his mind and creates a divide which puts Aksim on a path of no return.
